name: Tivona & Haug, Inc.
description: Provider of a web and mobile-based corporate traveling platform designed to organize travel plans. The company's platform is a virtual travel agent offering mobile travel assistant service, organizes travel plans and sends personalized notifications and also offers free trip alerts like updates on flight delays, gate changes and important travel announcements, enabling corporate travelers to travel cheaper, hassle-free and happier.
